itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with American Airlines and NHL not heeding social distancing rules, Russians have been hiring jihadists to kill American soldiers, Austin bar owners are protestin...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway and Jessie Wiseman bring you the realest fake news of the week with American Airlines and NHL not heeding social distancing rules, Russians have been hiring jihadists to kill American soldiers, Austin bar owners are protesting the shutdown of their businesses by the order of Texas governor Greg Abbott, Guatemala has put a cap on US deportations back to their country, Rep. Adam Schiff says we may all live in Canada soon, there will be delays for IRS refunds, Joe Biden responds to questions about his cognitive abilities, new reports show that once again the American economy is exceeding expectations, and Jeffrey Epstein confidante Ghislaine Maxwell has finally been arrested on sex abuse charges.
